about_us_content1: Exicube Taxi is a Taxi / Cab booking App. Exicube App Solutions(OPC) Pvt. Ltd. has designed it.
about_us_content2: We, at Exicube aspire to become the top notch organisation who will shape the future of Mobile Applications. Exicube Taxi is a Taxi / Cab booking App like Uber and Lyft. It comes with a Rider cum Driver App and an Admin Portal.
product_section_para: Exicube Taxi is best App based taxi service in town.
product_section_1: Your experience is important to us. We never compromise on our standards. Safety regulations are particularly emphasized to ensure peace of mind.
product_section_2: View live tracking, price estimations, and even book ahead of time! We have every avenue covered with every latest technology.
product_section_3: Aside from cash, credit card, payments are PCI DSS compliant. The website has an SSL certification, and the apps are checked by the Apple Store and Google Play.
privacy_policy_para1: Your privacy is important to us. It is Exicube App Solutions (OPC) Private Limited's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, https://exicube.com, and other sites we own and operate.
privacy_policy_para2: We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used.
privacy_policy_para3: We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorised access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
privacy_policy_para4: We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law.
privacy_policy_para5: Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies.
privacy_policy_para6: You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services.
privacy_policy_para7: Your continued use of our website will be regarded as acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, feel free to contact us.
login_validate_error: Email or Password is not correct.

past_booking_error: Ride Later is not avaialable for Past Datetime or within next 15 mins.

email_verify_message: Please verify your email. Email is already sent to your Inbox.
name: Name
allow_location: Allow Location for the Realtime Map
title: Title
forgot_password_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset password?
password_alphaNumeric_check: Password must consists of at least 1 alphanumeric characters and 8-15 length.
password_complexity_check: Password must be atleast 1 small-case letter, 1 Capital letter, 1 digit, 1 special character and 6-10 length.
valid_email_check: Please enter a valid email address.

delete_account_modal_subtitle: Do you want to delete your account ?
no_driver_found_alert_messege: Sorry,No Drivers found right now.Please try again later
cab_selection_subtitle: Tap to select car type and book now
no_details_error: Please fill up all the details properly.
promo_eligiblity: Sorry! Promo is not valid as bill amount is lower.
promo_used: Sorry! You have already used the promo code.
promo_exp: Sorry! Promo usage date has expired.
new_booking_notification: You Have A New Booking Request
estimate_fare_text: This is your Estimate fare only
panic_question: Do you really want to make a Panic Call?
driver_journey_msg: Driver started your ride. Your booking id is
ignore_job_title: Do you want to ignore this job?
rider_not_here: NO RIDE REQUESTS AT THE MOMENT

require_approval: Your account requires approval from Admin
navigation_available: Map Navigation is only available when booking is ACCEPTED or STARTED
received_rating: You received a X star rating
withdraw_below_zero: Withdraw amount cannot be less than or equal to 0.
withdraw_more: Withdraw amount cannot be greater than Wallet Balance.
mobile_apps_on_store: Mobile Apps available on App Stores
wallet_balance_zero: You Wallet Balance is 0. If you take Payment in Cash, the Admin Convenience Fee will get deducted from Wallet and your Wallet Balance will be in Negative after the Ride. Negative balance will restrict further Rides. You need to Recharge Wallet or Ask Admin for help.
wallet_balance_negative: You Wallet Balance is NEGATIVE. Please recharge your Wallet.
disclaimer_text: This app collects location data to enable 'Search Vehicle Location', 'Travel Route and Navigation', 'Realtime Vehicle Movement', even when the app is closed or not in use.
push_error_1: Failed to get push token for push notification!
push_error_2: Must use physical device for Push Notifications
cancel_reason_2: Cab is not moving in my direction
proper_bonus: PLease enter proper bonus in numbers.
NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses the always location access in the background for improved pickups and dropoffs, customer support and safety purpose.
NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses the always location access in the background for improved pickups and dropoffs, customer support and safety purpose.
NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses the location to find the Cabs near you.
NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take your profile picture.
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses Photo Library for uploading your profile picture.
NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This App will track your location continuously and in background. This data will be used to show your vehicle position to the client realtime, which will help in improved pickups and drop-offs, also increasing agility and safely in the process.
user_exists: User with same Email or Mobile number exists.
user_does_not_exists: Mobile Number is not registered. Register User first.
reg_error: Error while Signup. Please check the entered data carefully.
user_issue_contact_admin: No profile data found. Please contact Admin
email_or_mobile_issue: Please check your email id or mobile number. Note: Mobile number should be in International format e.g. +919999888877
share_msg: Hi, Use this code while registering to Exicube Taxi to get Bonus of
